"A.P.241/4/22/18:00": "Say, Hitsugi. Are you really going to fight Mother?"
"What? You're scared about it now?"
"Oh, no, that's not what I meant... I was just thinking, maybe this entire situation has gotten too big for us to handle."
"Yeah... This situation is definitely more than I expected."
"Mother cluster apostles... embodied weapons, ESCA darkers... They would've been unthinkable before."
"But, no matter how out of control things seem, my goal will not change."
"I am going to rescue Aru from Mother. That's my only goal."
"I see."
"Kohri, you're still hesitant, right? Whether or not you should fight against Mother."
"Wha?! N-No, that's not..."
"Is Mother right, or is she wrong? Are we right, or are we wrong? That's something we won't know as we're involved."
"That's why it's not important. What's important is what you want to do."
"Think for yourself, and decide for yourself... That's all."
"Kohri, if you're still lost, you don't have to come with me. Being lost can lead to painful experiences."
"Hitsugi wants to save Aru. Then I want to support Hitsugi. That's my only goal."
"That's why I'm not hesitating or lost. I'm going to go with Hitsugi."
"Kohri..."
"Besides, if Mother is wrong, then we have to help her stop... As members of Mother Cluster."
"Then, as usual, I'll be moving fast and without mercy. Best be prepared, Kohri."
"Yes."
"...Hitsugi, you've changed."
"Really? Maybe it's just my tough act?"
"Nope, that's not true. Before, your answers were based on logic, and you pushed on because of that, but now you're different."
"Saying what you want, doing as you feel, gathering momentum every step."
"I'm hearing that as \"acting without thinking\"... but I guess you're right."
"But you know... I like this Hitsugi more."
"...Oh, is this where you get mad and go \"Stop pretending to be Hitsugi!\"? or say \"You're a fake!\" and cut me down?"
"D-Don't bring that stuff up!"
"Besides, you were really ambiguous at the time, you know! You really did seem like a fake, you know!"
"You're quick to spit poison. I mean, I was pretty unsure at the time, but..."
"But then, at that time, Kohri cut me down good, so I was able to come to my senses."
"Uuuuuu... cut me! Cut me down too! And then... stab me! Hitsugi, kill me with your own two hands!"
"And I'll live on forever in Hitsugi's heart, for all eternity..."
"Oh, that might be really romantic! To keep existing forever in your heart... very poetic!"
"...I want to learn how you are never shaken, no matter the circumstances."
